body: An opportunity for an energetic Housekeeper to join the household team of a mature couple who move between UK, France and Ireland on an annual basis. Location: UK, France and IrelandJob description: Housekeeping :- cleaning- laundry- ironing- some assistance with cooking, mostly light and varied mediterranean-style- other household tasks as required Requirements:English (B2 level and above)Clean driving licenceProven housekeeping/cleaning experienceEnthusiasmCheerful personalityReferences if possible - written from previous employer and close acquaintanceWilling to travel between UK, France and Ireland during the yearCommitted to full year of service, renewable Terms:Employment contract with UK-based companyRemuneration and benefits package worth GBP 17,500+ made up of:- Gross annual salary of approx. GBP 14,400- Annual anniversary bonus (GBP 1350) paid at end of month of completion of each full year of service- Accommodation provided in UK, France and Ireland, including  electricity, water, council tax, internet- Use of pool car by arrangement with employer- One return ticket to home country paid by employer in each year
title: Housekeeper
locations: Dover, Anglia, Regatul Unit al Marii Britanii şi Irlandei de Nord;Dublin, Dublin, Irlanda;Saint-Tropez, Provența-Alpi-Coasta de Azur, Franţa
